title: Lothersdale: an image of England
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Britain - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Village communities - Great Britain
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Britain - Description and travel
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Industries - Great Britain

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/England - Social conditions
description: Looks at Lothersdale, an epitome of England, and examines the life and work of this village. The mill and other industries are viewed, while the economic problems of farmers are examined.
